analysis.description:
Reentrancy in IQTCrowdsale.distributeIQTToken (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#285-309):
	External calls:
	- isSuccess = tokenReward.transfer(currentParticipantAddress,amountIqtToken) (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#297-302)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorList (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#303-305)

Reentrancy in IQTCrowdsale.distributeIQTTokenBatch (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#312-341):
	External calls:
	- isSuccess = tokenReward.transfer(currentParticipantAddress,amountIqtToken) (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#326-328)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorList (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#333-336)

IQTCrowdsale.withdrawIQT (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#269-281) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#277-278)

IQTCrowdsale.distributeIQTToken has external calls inside a loop:
	- isSuccess = tokenReward.transfer(currentParticipantAddress,amountIqtToken) (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#297-302)

IQTCrowdsale.distributeIQTTokenBatch has external calls inside a loop:
	- isSuccess = tokenReward.transfer(currentParticipantAddress,amountIqtToken) (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#326-328)

Reentrancy in IQTCrowdsale.withdrawIQT (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#269-281):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#277-278)
	- tokenBalance = tokenReward.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#280-281)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenBalance (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#280-281)

IQTCrowdsale.FOURTH_RATE should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#99-100)
IQTCrowdsale.SECOND_TIER_RATE should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#96-99)
IQTCrowdsale.START_RATE should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#95-96)
IQTCrowdsale.THIRD_TIER_RATE should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#99)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.setOwner (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#37) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_contributor' of IQTCrowdsale.processTransaction (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#153) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of IQTCrowdsale.processTransaction (/unique_chucks/13/0xa667227ca1b68563d9245ad91aab9db58a60c382.sol#153-154) is not in mixedCase
